mapper.select: select pce_num pceNum,name,address,phone_number phoneNumber,category,city,place_img placeImg from places;
mapper.update: update places set name=#{name}, address=#{address}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, category=#{category}, city=#{city} where pce_num like #{pceNum};
mapper.delete: delete from places where #{pceNum} like pce_Num
